item.title: The Only Type of Testing You Need
item.description:
Use code PATTERNS20 at checkout to get 20% off our 3 Design Patterns in C# Bundles: https://bit.ly/3YPiHLD Subscribe to my weekly newsletter: https://nickchapsas.com
Become a Patreon and get special perks: https://www.patreon.com/nickchapsas
Hello, everybody. I'm Nick, and in this video, I will introduce you to my newest favourite testing technique called Snapshot testing, using the nuget package, Verify.
Give Verify a star: https://github.com/VerifyTests/Verify
Workshops: https://bit.ly/nickworkshops
Don't forget to comment, like and subscribe :)

item.title: C: Planning & Game Design 2 (Category Compilation) #10～#18
item.description:
In Category C: Planning & Game Design, I talk about topics to consider when coming up with game ideas and mechanics. These are good things to keep in mind when thinking of new game concepts.
[Index] 0:00 Opening 0:11 C-10 Making Tutorials Feel Natural 3:06 C-11 Praise the Player! 5:37 C-12 Don't Be Unresponsive 8:10 C-13 Game Writing is Unique 11:45 C-14 The Fun in Picking Sides 14:13 C-15 Motion Sickness in 3D Games 17:35 C-16 Staying Organized with Hierarchical Outlines 19:56 C-17 Planning Your Game’s Rewards 25:04 C-18 Avoiding Comparison
[Playlist C: Planning & Game Design] https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgKCjZ2WsVLSmJwGC258l2HhWgf-P877B
item.author: (Masahiro Sakurai on Creating Games)

item.title: What's new in .NET 9.0 and C# 13
item.description:
Wondering what's new in .NET 9.0?
I've picked my favorite additions to .NET, ASP.NET Core and C#!
We're going to discover some great additions to .NET, such as improvements to Spans, System.Text.Json, Base64Urls and much more!
When it comes to ASP.NET Core 9.0, did you know it completely changes how it's using OpenId Connect by default? This is a great change, and something you definitely need to understand if your application is using OAuth and OpenId Connect.
We're also going to look at changes to .NET Aspire, a great way to speed up the development process.
Last but not least, let's look at the additions to C#!
Each topic deserves its own dedicated video, we are only scratching the surface.
Let's learn all about .NET 9.0 and C# 13!
Follow me on Twitter: @fekberg https://twitter.com/fekberg
Check out my courses on Pluralsight: https://pluralsight.pxf.io/d1MRK
DISCLAIMER: This video and description contains affiliate links, which means that if you click on one of the links, I may receive a small commission.
item.author: (Filip Ekberg)

item.title: .NET Aspire for Beginners - Full Series
item.description:
Dive into the world of .NET Aspire. In this series, we will learn about .NET Aspire, an opinionated, cloud-ready stack for building distributed applications with .NET.
00:00 - What is .NET Aspire? 11:08 - Developer Workstation Setup 19:11 - Smart Defaults for your system 35:33 - Orchestration and the Dashboard 50:24 - Simplifying Communications with Service Discovery 59:35 - .NET Aspire Integrations 01:14:44 - Deploying a .NET Aspire Solution

#dotnet

item.title: Everything I've learned so far about running local LLMs
Build a ChapGPT App In C# with the OpenAI API! - Large Language Model Programming Tutorial
item.description:
In this video, learn how to build a simple yet powerful console application that communicates with ChatGPT to send prompts and receive AI-generated responses. Follow along as I demonstrate the code setup, explain key functions, and show how to integrate OpenAI's API into your C# application. Perfect for developers looking to add AI capabilities to their projects or those curious about building ChatGPT-driven applications. Tune in, get hands-on, and start building
#chatgpt #ai #csharp #tech
item.author: (Nick Proud)
